name: Microsoft Power Automate
description: Integrate with Microsoft Power Automate to list, run, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Flows
tools.description: List flows (automations) in the Power Automate environment. Returns flow names, states, and trigger types.

tools.name: Run Flow
tools.description: Trigger a Power Automate flow (must have an HTTP request or manual trigger). Optionally pass input data as the request body.

tools.name: Get Flow
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Power Automate flow. Returns name, state, trigger details, action count, and connection references.

tools.name: List Runs
tools.description: List recent runs (execution history) for a Power Automate flow. Returns run IDs, statuses, and durations.

tools.name: Get Run
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Power Automate flow run. Returns status, duration, trigger details, and action results.
